電話注文: (でんわちゅうもん) - telephone order
電話盗聴: (でんわとうちょう) - phone tapping; wiretap
電話線貸与: (でんわせんたいよ) - leased telephone line
電話通信: (でんわつうしん) - telephony; telephone communication
電請: (でんせい) - wire (one's government) for instructions
電車通り: (でんしゃどおり) - street with streetcar tracks; street with a tram line
電車道: (でんしゃみち) - street with tramline/railroad track; {sumo}  railroading the opponent straight out of the ring
電車道相撲: (でんしゃみちすもう) - {sumo} railroading an opponent straight out of the ring
電通大: (でんつうだい) - University of Electro-Communications
電郵: (でんゆう) - (an item of) electronic mail (e-mail)/e-mail message; electronic mail (e-mail) service/electronic mail (e-mail) system
電量滴定: (でんりょうてきてい) - coulombic titration; coulometric titration
電鉄会社: (でんてつがいしゃ) - (electric) railroad company
電鍵: (でんけん) - telegraph key (switching device used to send Morse code)
電鐘: (でんしょう) - electric signal bell (esp. at railway crossings)
電離放射線: (でんりほうしゃせん) - ionizing radiation
電電公社: (でんでんこうしゃ) - Nippon Telegraph and Telephone Public Corporation (defunct)
需要の弾力性: (じゅようのだんりょくせい) - elasticity of demand
需要の所得弾力性: (じゅようのしょとくだんりょくせい) - income elasticity of demand
需要を賄う: (じゅようをまかなう) - to meet the demand
需要供給: (じゅようきょうきゅう) - supply and demand
需要供給の法則: (じゅようきょうきゅうのほうそく) - law of supply and demand
需要増加: (じゅようぞうか) - increased demand; increasing demand
需要拡大: (じゅようかくだい) - increase in (expansion of) demand
需要減少: (じゅようげんしょう) - reduced demand; decline in demand
霄壌: (しょうじょう) - heaven and earth
震: (cedo/tremer) - quake , zhen (one of the trigrams of the I Ching: thunder, east)
震う: (ふるう) - to shake; to tremble; to vibrate
震える: (ふるえる) - to shiver; to shake; to quake; to tremble; to quaver; to quiver
震え上がる: (ふるえあがる) - to tremble violently; to shudder up
震え出す: (ふるえだす) - to begin to tremble
震え声: (ふるえごえ) - trembling or quavering voice
震れる: (ふれる) - (振れる, 震れる only) to swing/to shake/to wave; to veer/to deflect/to lean towards
震わす: (ふるわす) - to (make something) quiver; to shake; to tremble; to vibrate
震わせる: (ふるわせる) - to (make something) quiver; to shake; to tremble; to vibrate
震動: (しんどう) - shock; tremor; impact; vibration
震度階級: (しんどかいきゅう) - (the Japanese scale ranges from level 0 ("imperceptible") to level 7 ("disastrous"))  seismic intensity scale
震撼させる: (しんかんさせる) - to shock; to shake
震旦: (しんだん) - (orig. from the Sanskrit 'Cinasthana') (ancient) China
震源: (しんげん) - hypocentre (of an earthquake); hypocenter
震源断層: (しんげんだんそう) - earthquake source fault
震源時: (しんげんじ) - origin time (of an earthquake)
震災地: (しんさいち) - area of an earthquake disaster
震災記念日: (しんさいきねんび) - anniversary of the Great Kanto earthquake
震災関連死: (しんさいかんれんし) - earthquake-related death
震駭させる: (しんがいさせる) - to frighten; to terrify; to shock
霊: (rei/ryou/tama) - spirits , soul, spirit, departed soul, ghost
霊亀: (れいき) - mysterious turtle (an omen of good luck); Reiki era (715.9.2-717.11.17)
